about_the_game:
Welcome to PANIK!




PANIK is an isometric puzzle game where, throughout several levels, you must guide different characters until you reach the goal cells. To do so, you will have to use each character's unique movement mechanics, plan your steps and keep in mind the most important rule: Do not panik.




In PANIK, there are mainly two types of characters:
  • The leaders: these are the ones who can move freely. You will recognize them by the crown they wear on their head!
  • The neutrals: these are the ones who can only move if they are not in panik. Within this category, characters can have different movement skills that allow them to move through cells in different ways. From a character who can fly over the void cells to another one who can swap positions with another character.




However, every character has a limited number of moves in each level so you should think carefully about how you will use them. If you run out of moves or if all the characters are in panik, you lose.

Meet all the characters throughout more than 30 unique levels and complete all the puzzles!




PANIK was originally developed for the SpainGameDevsJam III in September 2021 and was one of the top 25 games in the overall category.

CURRENT CONTENT:

  • 30 unique levels
  • 5 characters with their own skills

FUTURE CONTENT:

  • More levels
  • More characters
  • More panik!
